name: Together Alone (sharpai.group)
description:
Together Alone is a game created with the theme "Joined Together" for the competition of GMTK 2021.

It is the story of an elf girl, in search of her tribe, however, she has a single flaw, she must always join a team, always being together with other people.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enter this adventure, discover multiple different paths, help your friends and try to never be alone

This game was made by the SharpAI team (@sharp_ai), who are currently making another game that uses neural networks in creating its story. In the game credits, there are references to various resources used in the game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips and Trick: [Spoilers] 

**only see them if you're stuck or wish to continue the story Always stay close to someone: 

- Go after the baker before continuing the journey with the old man

- Help the Hunter 

- Do not accept the Stranger's request 

- Always continue on the journey helping everyone 

- Don't let the Hunter open the treasure

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Acknowledgment Thanks to everyone who helped with the project, including the artistic and sound effects team at SharpAI, who did an excellent job. We thank the respective owners of each asset used in the project, as well as everyone who played and supported the project. We also thank Mark Brown for making his videos that are of the highest quality and free, allowing new indie gamers to get a bigger view of how to design their games.
